The draft workplan is available in a variety of formats as a series of headings to assist in project planning. Delete columns as required.

1. [All formats](https://github.com/poldham/abs_permits/blob/gh-pages/annex/draft_workplan.zip?raw=true)
2. [.csv](https://github.com/poldham/abs_permits/raw/gh-pages/annex/draft_workplan/draft_workplan.csv)
3. [Excel](https://github.com/poldham/abs_permits/blob/gh-pages/annex/draft_workplan/draft_workplan.xlsx?raw=true)
4. [XML for Microsoft Project](https://github.com/poldham/abs_permits/raw/gh-pages/annex/draft_workplan/draft_workplan.xml)
5. [.pdf](https://github.com/poldham/abs_permits/raw/gh-pages/annex/draft_workplan/draft_workplan.pdf)
